title: Stories for the Dead of Night
description: CONTENTSMiss Gentilbelle by Charles BeaumontThe Middle Toe of the Right Foot by Ambrose BierceThe Illustrated Man by Ray BradburyThe Chaser by John CollierThe Shadow by Ben HechtThe Lottery by Shirley JacksonSredni Vashtar by SakiThe Tell-Tale Heart by Edgar Allan PoeTwo Bottles of Relish by Lord DunsanyTaboo by Geoffrey HouseholdRevenge by Samuel BlasThe Pit by Gwyn JonesMan From The South by Roald DahlThe Demon Lover by Elizabeth BowenSilver Circus by A.E. CoppardPalace of Sleep by Anna KavanThe Woman At Seven Brothers by Wilbur Daniel SteeleA Journey by Edith WhartonThe Proof by John MooreThe Turn of the Tide by C.S. Forester
author: Don Congdon
